features: Disappearing purple formula helps kids see where the glue is
Dries clear and applies smoothly for a mess-free appearance
The #1 teacher brand, it’s ideal for younger learners, making poster presentations, crafting, and more
Washable, non-toxic, acid-free formula is ideal for classrooms and homes
body.description: Product Description Purple on contact yet drying clear, Elmer’s Disappearing Purple School Glue Sticks help you see exactly where you’re sticking your charts, pictures, and more! The glue stick applies smoothly with a disappearing purple formula, making it perfect for kids just learning how to glue. Add on its non-toxic, acid-free formula and you can see why it’s the ideal adhesive for classrooms, homes, and youngsters. From the Manufacturer For more than sixty years, Elmer's Products, Inc., has been providing creative adhesive solutions that support project success and turn ideas into reality. By continuing to develop innovative new products, Elmer's has become the trusted brand when it comes to fueling creativity and providing outstanding product performance in the classroom, at home, in the workshop and at the craft table. Elmer's products inspire people to create, build and learn for life. Elmer's School Glue is easy to use and stays where you put it. View larger Elmer's Disappearing Purple School Glue Sticks go on smoothly and are great for kids. View larger Which Elmer's Adhesive Products Is Best for Your Needs?Elmer's answers the most important question of all: "which glue should I use?" Whether you are a teacher, a student, a crafter, a business owner or a homeowner, Elmer's the "Glue Experts" for over 60 years, offers the solutions to all your glue and adhesive needs. The trusted brand for fueling creativity and product performance. View larger Elmer's Washable, No-Run School Glue--Elmer's Washable, No-Run School Glue is easy to use and stays where you put it. It is safe, non-toxic, and washable, so accidental messes mean easy clean-up. Bonds most porous materials such as paper and cloth, and semi-porous materials such as wood and pottery.Elmer's Disappearing Purple School Glue Sticks--Elmer's Disappearing Purple School Glue Sticks go on smoothly and are great for kids. The Disappearing Purple formula goes on purple, so it is easy to see and dries clear. It is safe, non-toxic, and is a must-have for all students.Elmer's Glue-All--America's all-purpose glue is now better than ever. Perfect for school projects, crafts and home repair. Works on a variety of materials, i.e. paper, wood, fabric, leather, ceramics and more. Elmer's Glue-All is a must-have for the kitchen, home office, workshop and garage. Bonds strong for all your needs.Elmer's Washable Repositionable School Glue Sticks--Elmer's Repositionable School Glue Stick goes on smooth and dries fast, clear, and colorless. The formula allows you to stick and re-stick so it's perfect for school projects, decorations, and much more.Elmer's All-Purpose Glue Sticks--Elmer's All Purpose Glue Stick is a favorite for easy, no-mess bonding. The All Purpose formula bonds clear and strong and works on a variety of paper types, including cardboard, foam board, display board, computer paper, and more. Elmer's All Purpose Glue Stick goes on smooth and dries fast, clear and colorless. It is acid-free, washable, safe and non-toxic.Elmer's Carpenter's Wood Glue--Elmer's Carpenter's Wood Glue has been in American homes for generations. Contractors and homeowners alike use Carpenter's Wood Glue because it sets fast and bonds strong, even stronger than wood. Carpenter's Wood Glue is sandable and paintable, so you'll have the perfect finish every time. Easy to clean up with water. Elmer's for the Classroom A favorite of teachers everywhere Elmer's All-Purpose Washable School Glue Sticks--Elmer's classroom packs are ideal for teachers everywhere. Make sure all your projects meet the standards you demand. Elmer's All Purpose Washable School Glue Stick goes on smoothly, is safe, washable, and non-toxic, making all your lesson plans easier and more fun.Elmer's School Glue--Elmer's School Glue is a trusted favorite of classroom teachers everywhere. Going back to school just wouldn't be the same without it. Elmer's School Glue is safe, non-toxic, and washable, so accidental messes mean easy clean-up. Elmer's convenient Gallon size emphasizes reducing waste while keeping your students prepared for any project.Elmer's Disappearing Purple School Glue Sticks--The Elmer's Disappearing Purple School Glue Stick, available in a classroom-ready pack of 30, goes on smoothly and is great for kids. The Disappearing Purple formula goes on purple, so it is easy to see and dries clear. It is safe, non-toxic, and a must have for all students.Find the Right Glue for YouUse this guide as you create, build and learn with Elmer's. manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: At a Glance: Bonds to paper, foam board, cardboard, and more Goes on purple and dries clear Washes easily off hands and out of clothes Non-toxic and acid-free Great for arts, crafts, and school projects Elmer's Disappearing Purple School Glue Stick (30 x 7g) Elmer's Disappearing Purple School Glue Sticks are a fun way to attach items to paper, display board, cardboard, foam board, photos, and much more. The glue is purple when first applied, so it's easy to see, then it dries clear. For convenience, this glue is also specially formulated to be washable, non-toxic, and acid-free. Get smooth, clump-free results at home, school, or on the go with Elmer's Disappearing Purple School Glue Sticks. What's in the Box: 30 Washable Elmer's Disappearing Purple School Glue Sticks, 0.24-ounce sticks

Disappearing Purple Makes Application Easy Use Elmer's Disappearing Purple School Glue Sticks for precise application. Great for kids, the glue is purple when first applied so it's easy to see, then it dries clear for easy bonding and great results.

The Glue with the Orange Cap Fast Drying Formula for Rapid Results Glue on items quickly with Elmer's Disappearing Purple School Glue Sticks. Designed to go on evenly, the glue dries rapidly for hassle-free bonding. Save time and reduce mess with Elmer's Disappearing Purple School Glue Sticks. *The Glue with the Orange Cap Washable for Easy Cleanup Created with parents and teachers in mind, Elmer's Disappearing Purple School Glue Sticks are safe, non-toxic, and washable. Elmer's Disappearing Purple School Glue Sticks clean easily off of hands and out of clothes for fun, no-mess gluing. Create, Build and Learn with Elmer's For more than 65 years, Elmer's products have been the perfect choice for inspiration and convenience. With a full range of art, craft, repair, school, and office products for both children and adults, Elmer's keeps you prepared for almost any project.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for teachers and kids
reviews.reviewText: They work well.They haven’t dried out, I bought a box last year for at home and they are still sticky.They go on purple but dry clear, easy to see where you are pasting.These are small standard size glue sticks.It’s cost effective to buy a large box when you have multiple children, then you can split them up.We send a box each year to my little ones teachers, they never have enough glue sticks. Trust me your kids teachers will thank you, little ones go though so many glue sticks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price for the amount of product
reviews.reviewText: This is a great pack and great price. Especially if you have kids at home. There is plenty of glue sticks for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love these glue sticks!! My favorite kind and provides the perfect amount of sticky god my students. I always run out and love that these are frequently on sale. This makes it cheaper on my teacher budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the price
reviews.reviewText: I love this glue it works very well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product and price
reviews.reviewText: I like the purple color, cuz I see where the glue is placed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Always get this brand
reviews.reviewText: This is the only glue to trust that will last the longest without drying out and be durable enough for projects. It was perfect for a class size to each get their own, and then extra for the room as we ran out of glue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Product Great value
reviews.reviewText: The only brand I use in a glue stickCFV

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for projects
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to donate to a school for children who may not have them. As far as I know, they’ve worked great.
These were purchased for our Sparks/Embers group and love the fact that even though it looks like it is a purple glue, it actually goes on clear. Money well spent.
Good quality glue, in small tubes so it is less likely to dry out.
個々に包装されていないため、次第に劣化変色します。大量に購入するかたは保存方法に気をつけた方が良いと思います。
Received bonus glue sticks in each package so I received 40 instead of the 30. Very pleased!
